value.name: Four family members charged with murder in a case that police say resulted from mistaken identity
value.description: Four members of one Texas family are accused of killing a Houston-area man who they believed had vandalized their home and vehicles, according to the Harris County Sheriff's Office.

value.name: 4 members of Houston family charged in shooting death in case of mistaken identity
value.description: Four family members have been charged with murder in the shooting death of a 29-year-old neighbor who they mistook for someone who had been damaging their property, officials said. Authorities arrested 19-year-old Joe Argueta in connection with the Monday night fatal shooting in the 17100 block of Hilton Hollow Drive in the Westminster Village subdivision,
